scripts.build: tsc && vite build --mode testnet && cp -r ../contract/dist/managed/game2/keys ./dist/keys && cp -r ../contract/dist/managed/game2/zkir ./dist/zkir
scripts.build-undeployed: tsc && vite build --mode undeployed && cp -r ../contract/dist/managed/game2/keys ./dist/keys && cp -r ../contract/dist/managed/game2/zkir ./dist/zkir
scripts.build-batcher: tsc && vite build --mode batcher-undeployed && cp -r ../contract/dist/managed/game2/keys ./dist/keys && cp -r ../contract/dist/managed/game2/zkir ./dist/zkir
scripts.preview: vite build --mode mock --watch & vite preview --mode mock
